allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Build complete equipment rental management system with authentication and dashboard

- Implement 5-table database schema (employee, customer, equipment, rental, rental_detail)
- Add Flask-Login authentication system with employee model
- Create dynamic dashboard with rental metrics and analytics
- Implement 10% late fee calculation for overdue rentals
- Build rental management with return processing
- Add customer and equipment inventory views
- Create modern purple/teal/emerald UI theme
- Include deployment scripts for schema and seed data
- Add comprehensive README with setup instructions

Features:
- Employee authentication with secure password hashing
- Dashboard displaying total revenue, most rented equipment, and overdue rentals
- Automatic late fee calculation (10% of subtotal)
- Rental tracking with active, completed, and overdue status
- Customer management with rental history
- Equipment inventory with availability tracking
